definitions.definition: A flourish of trumpets or horns as to announce; a short and lively air performed on hunting horns during the chase.
examples: They played a short fanfare to announce the arrival of the king.

definitions.definition: A show of ceremony or celebration .
examples: The town opened the new library with fanfare and a speech from the mayor.

main_definition: ( countable ) A flourish of trumpets or horns as to announce; a short and lively air performed on hunting horns during the chase.
secondary_definitions: ( countable , uncountable ) A show of ceremony or celebration .
